data.text: @minusthebrant @Wario64 I am happy(ish) about rather than having Covid but using the tests, I'm able to verify this and make sure I'm not going to give Covid to the coworker with cancer. While baffling they want me to come in even with a cold, I feel better for her that I can verify that it's not Covid
@Wario64 yeah for free... lol Government paid for that shit and yes.. the money came from you. stop the BS "Free"

@the_paris_green @Wario64 Sort of. I’m not sure if other positions but as a carrier. Even part time, the expectations are you come when you’re needed. CCA hours and days are outrageous. RCA less so but unpredictable. Job and management are very demanding.
@Wario64 I just got my first set this week......
@32bitryan @Wario64 Not everyone shows symptoms when having Covid..

@32bitryan @Wario64 Such a stupid mindset. I wasn’t sick either…until I was. If I didn’t get tested I could of spread it to my grandpa who is immune compromised. I’m double vaccinated…fit and healthy and it still sucked to have. Use your last brain cell if that’s even possible
